name: TYTYTY
description:
This game is best experienced on mobile. If you are playing on desktop, you may need to enable third party cookies to play.

If you're on desktop, press Z to start (it acts as the A button)! 

TYTYTY is a 2D game set in a cornerstore about getting something nice for someone you love.

  • Up - Up Arrow / W
  • Down - Down Arrow / S
  • Left - Left Arrow / A
  • Right - Right Arrow / D
  • A Button — Alt / Z / J 
  • B Button — Ctrl / K / X
  • Start (List/Basket Menu in Store)— Enter
